name: Chaingang Runaway
description:
Game Makers Toolkit gamejam 2021 entry.

Find the key to free yourself from chains!

48hours
One man team
Godot

More of an prototype than actual game.
Throwing ball drags yourself after it.
Threat... or opportunity?

AWSD or Arrow keys: move
A or Up: Jump
Lmb: Pick up/Throw ball
Mouse: aim
